sourcesContent:
import { CheckoutPageContainer, CheckoutHeaderContainer, HeaderBlockContainer, TotalContainer, WarningContainer } from './Checkout.styles' import { use } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => ( Product Description Quantity Price Remove { cartItems.map(cartItem => ) } TOTAL: ${total} *Please use the following test credit card for payments*
USA - 4000 0566 5566 5556 - Any Exp & CVV ) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
